i played football in college.

i working in a publishing building.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
That's great to hear! I'm doing pretty good myself.
That's good to hear! I'm glad you're having a good day.
Thanks! What are you up to today?
I'm actually working in a publishing building right now.
Oh, that sounds cool! What do you do there?
I'm an editor.
That sounds like a really interesting job!
It is! I love reading and working with words.
Me too! I used to love to read when I was younger.
What kind of books did you like to read?
I used to read a lot of fantasy and science fiction.
Oh, those are great genres! I love fantasy.
Me too! I've always been a big fan of Harry Potter.
Me too! I love that series.
It's so good! I've read the whole series multiple times.
I have too! It's one of my favorite series of all time.
It's so good! I'm glad we could talk about our love of reading.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests
